text: Alveolar macrophages were recovered from the lungs of mice by BAL with 8 washes of 1 ml PBS at room temperature. BAL cells were pelleted for 5 min at 425 g and washed twice in complete RPMI-1640 medium. 2 Ã— 10 5 cells were seeded in 12-well plates and were allowed to adhere for 2 h. Non-adherent cells were removed by washing two times with PBS.
